alert.note: Alert for Bellevue and Vicinity; North Coast; Seattle and Vicinity (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 2:49AM PST until December 20 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...North coast, including Neah Bay, Forks, and Queets, Bellevue and vicinity, including Mill Creek, Kenmore, Kirkland, and Issaquah and Seattle and vicinity, including Shoreline, Vashon Island, Mercer Island, White Center, Kent, and Algona. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on very difficult travel. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Forecast accumulations for areas of the North Coast and much of Puget Sound have decreased, therefore a Winter Storm Warning previously in place has been downgraded to an Advisory.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bellevue and Vicinity; North Coast; Seattle and Vicinity
